mapper.insert: insert into sys_news ( title, content, publisher, addtime, uptime, pip, hits, sequence, recommand, status ) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{publisher}, #{addtime}, #{uptime}, #{pip}, #{hits}, #{sequence}, #{recommand}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update sys_news set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, publisher = #{publisher}, uptime = #{uptime}, pip = #{pip}, sequence = #{sequence}, recommand = #{recommand}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select title, publisher, addtime, uptime, pip, hits, sequence, recommand, status from sys_news where status = '1' order by recommand, sequence desc
